name: Cotton Candy: Surprise Dolls
description:
Take the role of the fun fair food creator and surprise Candy Spin Maker your customers in a cooking app with some yummy desserts!
Every kid loves sweet cotton candy. A big candy store has just opened in the city.
Do you want to be the manager of the store and learn to make cotton candy?
Follow the directions and turn the sugar color into cotton candy.
Serve your customers the different flavors of cotton candy. Expand your business and increase your income.
